fields.fieldValue: Do I have to be new to Spotify to get it with Spark, or can I already have a Spotify Premium account

Once you’ve added Spotify Premium to your Spark Account, you’ll need to activate it. We’ll send you a notification once you’re Spotify has been processed and is ready for activation. The link in this notification will take you to the Spotify website to sign in with an existing account or create a new account. Alternatively, you can begin the Activation of your Spotify Premium in MySpark.
How do I start using my Spotify Premium with Spark?

When do I need to activate my Spotify Premium?

Once you’ve added Spotify Premium to your Spark Account, you’ll need to activate it. We’ll send you a notification once you’re Spotify has been processed and is ready for activation. The link in this notification will take you to the Spotify website to sign in with an existing account or create a new account. Alternatively, you can begin the Activation of your Spotify Premium in MySpark.
When do I pay for my Spotify Premium?
